alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 2:28AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT/10 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest South Dakota, including the following counties, in south central South Dakota, Todd. In southwest South Dakota, Bennett and Jackson. * WHEN...Until 900 AM MDT Wednesday /1000 AM CDT Wednesday/. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 228 AM MDT /328 AM CDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Black Pipe Creek, Coffee Creek, Phister Creek, Long Creek, Red Leaf Creek, Settin Up Creek, Little White River, Pass Creek, Bear-in-the-Lodge Creek, Cottonwood Creek, Eagle Nest Creek, Spring Creek, Craven Creek, Swimmer Creek, Cut Meat Creek, Corn Creek, Eagle Chief Creek and Beads Creek. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Long Valley, Upper Cut Meat, Eagle Nest Butte, northwestern Rosebud Reservation and eastern Pine Ridge Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
